about_the_game:
Installation

:After installed, the DLC will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check the game library, right click "Trick & Treat", click "properties" and find the "local files".
It's in the folder "EN_Trick & Treat">>"Trick & Treat Art Book EN".

***
This Art Book is something extra for those who enjoy the little game, which includes everything about the game and its development.
It is an A4 sized ebook (a pdf file) with over 60 pages (30 double pages), and in this art book you will find:

  • Detailed character information
  • Doodles and sketches during the development
  • Comments from the developer
  • New illustrations

*Notice*
Please do not repost any part of the content without permission.
